itunes:title: Episode 729 - NFL Legend Jim McMahon
title: Episode 729 - NFL Legend Jim McMahon
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with special guest Jim McMahon, the QB for the 85' Bears to discuss the dangers of CTE and his ongoing lawsuits against the NFL, why most NFL players won't see any of the $3 Billion settlement, why he didn't want ...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with special guest Jim McMahon, the QB for the 85' Bears to discuss the dangers of CTE and his ongoing lawsuits against the NFL, why most NFL players won't see any of the $3 Billion settlement, why he didn't want to do "The Super Bowl Shuffle" music video, and Ross asks him about his love of "Donny and Marie".

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with special guest Jim McMahon, the QB for the 85' Bears to discuss the dangers of CTE and his ongoing lawsuits against the NFL, why most NFL players won't see any of the $3 Billion settlement, why he didn't want to do "The Super Bowl Shuffle" music video, and Ross asks him about his love of "Donny and Marie".
